title: LILLUSORY Women's Casual Sleeveless Bodycon Beach Tank Ruched Mini Dresses
description: Show off just the right amount of skin in this mini dress. Featured in a figure-flattering silhouette with classic crew neckline and waist tie for added shape.
The perfect blend of sweet and chic. This staple bodycon dress is featured in a stretchy fabrication and form-fitting silhouette designed to add effortless edge to your dress collection.
Soft and Breathable Fabric. Perfectly paired with sleek heels or dressed down with sporty sneakers, this mini has endless ways to wear.
MACHINE WASH COLD, TUMBLE DRY LOW: To maintain your apparel's vibrant color we recommend machine washing with laundry bag on cold.
Notice: Please Check The Size Chart Carefully Before Purchase and Allow 0.5-1 Inch Difference Due To Manual Measurement.(1 Inch = 2.129Cm); Different Monitor Settings Mean Colors May Differ Slightly
